org.tagaprice.server.dao.interfaces
Interface IProductDAO

All Known Implementing Classes:
HibernateProductDAO
public interface IProductDAO

Method Summary
 int countAll()
          Count all Products.
 java.util.List<Product> getAll()
          Retrieves a List of all Products.
 Product getById(java.lang.Long id)
          Retrieves the Product with given id.
 Product save(Product product)
          Saves given Product and returns the actually saved product with all of its persisted ProductRevisions set.
 

Method Detail

save

Product save(Product product)
Saves given Product and returns the actually saved product with all of its persisted ProductRevisions set.

Parameters:
product - the Product to save. The id of given Product and it's ProductRevisions must all be equal, i.e. null or the same long value.

getById

Product getById(java.lang.Long id)
Retrieves the Product with given id.

Parameters:
id - id of the Product to retrieve.
Returns:
the retrieved Product, or null if the product does not exist in the database.

getAll

java.util.List<Product> getAll()
Retrieves a List of all Products.

countAll

int countAll()
Count all Products.
